name: Hyeonjun Kim
body:
###Profile *B.S. in Computer Science from PNU(Pusan National University)
*Exchange student experience from State University of New York Oswego
*Private language institute experience from Oxford,UK

###Interests Current Computer Algorithm, Embedded system(IoT), Deep learning, C++14, Functional Paradigm Old Android development, Discrete Mathematics, JavaScript, Computer Security ###Skills Programming: C, C++14, Java, node.js, PHP Human Languages: English-Advanced, Korean - Native ###Development Experience Game development : RPG game with (libgdx + overlap 2d) with github.com/rators Concurrent programming : Registration system - Multi-threading, Java Concurrent Queue, and testing. Embedded programming(IoT) : Robot pet with some emotions (Cortex M3 + microC OS -3 ) Clocks emitting perfume - (Arduino, Android) Android development : Simple game "one to fifty" Graduation project : currently working on it, safety system with loRa technology Algorithm : solving problems at acmicpc.com (baekjoon Online judge) ###Campus Activities "Coala(Code + Algorithm + Life) Movement" - Programming Club on Campus "JigumHoe(지검회)" - Kendo club on Campus ###Work Experience Software Engineer, developing simulation program with department of industrial engineering by prof.Kaphwan Kim ###Awards LINC... .... ###Research Experience . ###Publications . ###ETC .
